ygData.subject: Made My First Aqua Lung last night =)
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello Folks, It was a good day to be a gnome. With the new patch, everything one needs to make the aqua lung is at the wind mills except for the fish...heh.
ygData.messageBody:
Hello Folks,

It was a good day to be a gnome. With the new patch, everything one needs to make the 'aqua lung' is at the wind mills except for the fish...heh.

I lucked out and found a 'sugar daddy' in my guild who was willing to cough up a ton of cash to let me try a few aqua lung attempts, and I made one first try. I failed the next 3 though and my skill is in the high 80's now.

But! *FizzWizz starts her mantra* "Verant Bastards!", Apparently, the aqua lung has ONE CHARGE !! A damn 225 plat or so for a single shot of 'dead mans breath' or whatever the water breathing spell is. This could be my imagination, because I only glanced at the stats before I handed it to a Dwarf friend of mine, but I thought I saw 50 charges before I handed it to him. Not sure, but perhaps the Gnome that makes it can get 50, and if you give it to someone else, they get only 1...not sure... I would like some more feedback on this.

So... that leaves us with the 'rebreather' version, which probably has unlimited charges. I dont know (need feedback) I have not made one yet. I would like to hear what the stats are on the rebreather if anyone knows.

Also I would like to know if anyone has found diamond dust yet for the gem chopper.

Anywho, thats all for now... Just thought folks might like to know.

Cheers,

"FizzWizz" of tunare
